# The `Bitfields.h` File Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

This file implements methods to test, set and extract typed bits from packed unsigned integers. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Description {#details}

<Link id="details" />


## Why not C++ bitfields?



C++ bitfields do not offer control over the bit layout nor consistent behavior when it comes to out of range values. For instance, the layout is implementation defined and adjacent bits may be packed together but are not required to. This is problematic when storage is sparse and data must be stored in a particular integer type.



The methods provided in this file ensure precise control over the layout/storage as well as protection against out of range values.



<Link id="details" />


## Usage example




<ProgramListing extension="cpp">

<CodeLine><Highlight kind="normal">uint8&#95;t Storage = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Store and retrieve a single bit as bool.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">using </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/targetlibraryinfo-cpp/#aca185e6d0e9f423dbb24440206454872a29dcc89db32a1eead61fe67cff38c060">Bool</a> = Bitfield::Element&lt;bool, 0, 1&gt;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><Highlight kind="normal">Bitfield::set&lt;Bool&gt;(Storage, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">true</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><Highlight kind="normal">EXPECT&#95;EQ(Storage, 0b00000001);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//                          ^</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><Highlight kind="normal">EXPECT&#95;EQ(Bitfield::get&lt;Bool&gt;(Storage), </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">true</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Store and retrieve a 2 bit typed enum.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Note: enum underlying type must be unsigned.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">enum class</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> SuitEnum : uint8&#95;t &#123; CLUBS, DIAMONDS, HEARTS, SPADES &#125;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Note: enum maximum value needs to be passed in as last parameter.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">using </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">Suit = Bitfield::Element&lt;SuitEnum, 1, 2, SuitEnum::SPADES&gt;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><Highlight kind="normal">Bitfield::set&lt;Suit&gt;(Storage, SuitEnum::HEARTS);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><Highlight kind="normal">EXPECT&#95;EQ(Storage, 0b00000101);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//                        ^^</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><Highlight kind="normal">EXPECT&#95;EQ(Bitfield::get&lt;Suit&gt;(Storage), SuitEnum::HEARTS);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Store and retrieve a 5 bit value as unsigned.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">using </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">Value = Bitfield::Element&lt;unsigned, 3, 5&gt;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><Highlight kind="normal">Bitfield::set&lt;Value&gt;(Storage, 10);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><Highlight kind="normal">EXPECT&#95;EQ(Storage, 0b01010101);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//                   ^^^^^</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><Highlight kind="normal">EXPECT&#95;EQ(Bitfield::get&lt;Value&gt;(Storage), 10U);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Interpret the same 5 bit value as signed.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">using </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">SignedValue = Bitfield::Element&lt;int, 3, 5&gt;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><Highlight kind="normal">Bitfield::set&lt;SignedValue&gt;(Storage, -2);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><Highlight kind="normal">EXPECT&#95;EQ(Storage, 0b11110101);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//                   ^^^^^</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><Highlight kind="normal">EXPECT&#95;EQ(Bitfield::get&lt;SignedValue&gt;(Storage), -2);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Ability to efficiently test if a field is non zero.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><Highlight kind="normal">EXPECT&#95;TRUE(Bitfield::test&lt;Value&gt;(Storage));</Highlight></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Alter Storage changes value.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><Highlight kind="normal">Storage = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><Highlight kind="normal">EXPECT&#95;EQ(Bitfield::get&lt;Bool&gt;(Storage), </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><Highlight kind="normal">EXPECT&#95;EQ(Bitfield::get&lt;Suit&gt;(Storage), SuitEnum::CLUBS);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><Highlight kind="normal">EXPECT&#95;EQ(Bitfield::get&lt;Value&gt;(Storage), 0U);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><Highlight kind="normal">EXPECT&#95;EQ(Bitfield::get&lt;SignedValue&gt;(Storage), 0);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><Highlight kind="normal">Storage = 255;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><Highlight kind="normal">EXPECT&#95;EQ(Bitfield::get&lt;Bool&gt;(Storage), </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">true</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><Highlight kind="normal">EXPECT&#95;EQ(Bitfield::get&lt;Suit&gt;(Storage), SuitEnum::SPADES);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><Highlight kind="normal">EXPECT&#95;EQ(Bitfield::get&lt;Value&gt;(Storage), 31U);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><Highlight kind="normal">EXPECT&#95;EQ(Bitfield::get&lt;SignedValue&gt;(Storage), -1);</Highlight></CodeLine>

</ProgramListing>

<Link id="l00092" /><CodeLine lineNumber="92"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00093" /><CodeLine lineNumber="93"><Highlight kind="comment">/// A struct defining useful bit patterns for n-bits integer types.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00094" /><CodeLine lineNumber="94" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/bitfields-details/bitpatterns"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">template</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &lt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">typename</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> T, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Bits&gt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">struct </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/bitfields-details/bitpatterns">BitPatterns</a> &#123;</Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="95"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Bit patterns are forged using the equivalent &#96;Unsigned&#96; type because of</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="96"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// undefined operations over signed types (e.g. Bitwise shift operators).</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="97"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Moreover same size casting from unsigned to signed is well defined but not</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="98"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// the other way around.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="99" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/bitfields-details/bitpatterns/#a256d10f001d8a689a25cf658d47e73e3"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">using </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/bitfields-details/bitpatterns/#a256d10f001d8a689a25cf658d47e73e3">Unsigned</a> = std::make&#95;unsigned&#95;t&lt;T&gt;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="100"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static&#95;assert</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">sizeof</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">(<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/bitfields-details/bitpatterns/#a256d10f001d8a689a25cf658d47e73e3">Unsigned</a>) == </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">sizeof</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/mips/mips16isellowering-cpp/#a0acb682b8260ab1c60b918599864e2e5">T</a>), </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Types must have same size&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="101"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="102" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/bitfields-details/bitpatterns/#a900dad517a613bb0a1da85fb8dd55f6d"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">constexpr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/bitfields-details/bitpatterns/#a900dad517a613bb0a1da85fb8dd55f6d">TypeBits</a> = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">sizeof</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">(<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/bitfields-details/bitpatterns/#a256d10f001d8a689a25cf658d47e73e3">Unsigned</a>) &#42; CHAR&#95;BIT;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00103" /><CodeLine lineNumber="103"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static&#95;assert</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">(<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/bitfields-details/bitpatterns/#a900dad517a613bb0a1da85fb8dd55f6d">TypeBits</a> &gt;= Bits, </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;n-bit must fit in T&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="104"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00105" /><CodeLine lineNumber="105"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// e.g. with TypeBits == 8 and Bits == 6</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="106" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/bitfields-details/bitpatterns/#af422860447e221241107decfbe91bc0f"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">constexpr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/bitfields-details/bitpatterns/#a256d10f001d8a689a25cf658d47e73e3">Unsigned</a> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/bitfields-details/bitpatterns/#af422860447e221241107decfbe91bc0f">AllZeros</a> = <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/bitfields-details/bitpatterns/#a256d10f001d8a689a25cf658d47e73e3">Unsigned</a>(0);                  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// 0</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00107" /><CodeLine lineNumber="107" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/bitfields-details/bitpatterns/#a3f3d4d91b7987dc71350acfa84e32b15"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">constexpr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/bitfields-details/bitpatterns/#a256d10f001d8a689a25cf658d47e73e3">Unsigned</a> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/bitfields-details/bitpatterns/#a3f3d4d91b7987dc71350acfa84e32b15">AllOnes</a> = <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/bitfields-details/bitpatterns/#a256d10f001d8a689a25cf658d47e73e3">~Unsigned</a>(0);                  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// 11111111</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="108" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/bitfields-details/bitpatterns/#a8b1beef3861a9c4b13c1fe0fc0e5e6ce"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">constexpr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/bitfields-details/bitpatterns/#a256d10f001d8a689a25cf658d47e73e3">Unsigned</a> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/bitfields-details/bitpatterns/#a8b1beef3861a9c4b13c1fe0fc0e5e6ce">Umin</a> = <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/bitfields-details/bitpatterns/#af422860447e221241107decfbe91bc0f">AllZeros</a>;                         </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// 0</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="109" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/bitfields-details/bitpatterns/#ad201bab28e409edb73a495dc1223f692"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">constexpr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/bitfields-details/bitpatterns/#a256d10f001d8a689a25cf658d47e73e3">Unsigned</a> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/bitfields-details/bitpatterns/#ad201bab28e409edb73a495dc1223f692">Umax</a> = <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/bitfields-details/bitpatterns/#a3f3d4d91b7987dc71350acfa84e32b15">AllOnes</a> &gt;&gt; (<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/bitfields-details/bitpatterns/#a900dad517a613bb0a1da85fb8dd55f6d">TypeBits</a> - Bits);     </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// 111111</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="110" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/bitfields-details/bitpatterns/#ac03fb7d13195746239d8386193354569"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">constexpr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/bitfields-details/bitpatterns/#a256d10f001d8a689a25cf658d47e73e3">Unsigned</a> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/bitfields-details/bitpatterns/#ac03fb7d13195746239d8386193354569">SignBitMask</a> = <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/bitfields-details/bitpatterns/#a256d10f001d8a689a25cf658d47e73e3">Unsigned</a>(1) &lt;&lt; (Bits - 1); </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// 100000</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="111" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/bitfields-details/bitpatterns/#a52f22fcfeb772edcd9194328b7709336"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">constexpr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/bitfields-details/bitpatterns/#a256d10f001d8a689a25cf658d47e73e3">Unsigned</a> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/bitfields-details/bitpatterns/#a52f22fcfeb772edcd9194328b7709336">Smax</a> = <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/bitfields-details/bitpatterns/#ad201bab28e409edb73a495dc1223f692">Umax</a> &gt;&gt; 1U;                       </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// 11111</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="112" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/bitfields-details/bitpatterns/#a825cb759b8b241d75306434b80b058af"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">constexpr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/bitfields-details/bitpatterns/#a256d10f001d8a689a25cf658d47e73e3">Unsigned</a> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/bitfields-details/bitpatterns/#a825cb759b8b241d75306434b80b058af">Smin</a> = <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/bitfields-details/bitpatterns/#a52f22fcfeb772edcd9194328b7709336">~Smax</a>;                            </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// 11100000</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="113" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/bitfields-details/bitpatterns/#a7c04cd4b16aa18377685d6adbcf3043c"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">constexpr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/bitfields-details/bitpatterns/#a256d10f001d8a689a25cf658d47e73e3">Unsigned</a> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/bitfields-details/bitpatterns/#a7c04cd4b16aa18377685d6adbcf3043c">SignExtend</a> = <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/bitfields-details/bitpatterns/#a256d10f001d8a689a25cf658d47e73e3">Unsigned</a>(<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/bitfields-details/bitpatterns/#a825cb759b8b241d75306434b80b058af">Smin</a> &lt;&lt; 1U);       </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// 11000000</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="114"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="116"><Highlight kind="comment">/// &#96;Compressor&#96; is used to manipulate the bits of a (possibly signed) integer</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="117"><Highlight kind="comment">/// type so it can be packed and unpacked into a &#96;bits&#96; sized integer,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="118"><Highlight kind="comment">/// &#96;Compressor&#96; is specialized on signed-ness so no runtime cost is incurred.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00119" /><CodeLine lineNumber="119"><Highlight kind="comment">/// The &#96;pack&#96; method also checks that the passed in &#96;UserValue&#96; is valid.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00120" /><CodeLine lineNumber="120"><Highlight kind="normal">template &lt;typename T, unsigned Bits, bool = std::is&#95;unsigned&lt;T&gt;::value&gt;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00121" /><CodeLine lineNumber="121" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/bitfields-details/compressor"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">struct </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/bitfields-details/compressor">Compressor</a> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00123" /><CodeLine lineNumber="123" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/bitfields-details/compressor/#aa250caaebf754b022cdc9cc3473b3651"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">using </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/bitfields-details/compressor/#aa250caaebf754b022cdc9cc3473b3651">BP</a> = <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/bitfields-details/bitpatterns">BitPatterns&lt;T, Bits&gt;</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00153" /><CodeLine lineNumber="153"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00154" /><CodeLine lineNumber="154"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Impl is where Bifield description and Storage are put together to interact</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00155" /><CodeLine lineNumber="155"><Highlight kind="comment">/// with values.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00156" /><CodeLine lineNumber="156" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/bitfields-details/impl"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">template</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &lt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">typename</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Bitfield, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">typename</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> StorageType&gt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">struct </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/bitfields-details/impl">Impl</a> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00157" /><CodeLine lineNumber="157"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static&#95;assert</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">(std::is&#95;unsigned&lt;StorageType&gt;::value,</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00167" /><CodeLine lineNumber="167"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00168" /><CodeLine lineNumber="168"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Checks &#96;UserValue&#96; is within bounds and packs it between &#96;FirstBit&#96; and</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00169" /><CodeLine lineNumber="169"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// &#96;LastBit&#96; of &#96;Packed&#96; leaving the rest unchanged.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00170" /><CodeLine lineNumber="170" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/bitfields-details/impl/#a70396106a4515186e3aefe39af98cc9e"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/bitfields-details/impl/#a70396106a4515186e3aefe39af98cc9e">update</a>(StorageType &amp;Packed, <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/bitfields-details/impl/#ade04c491df24f9f2cd9428791ec8fa02">IntegerType</a> UserValue) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00172" /><CodeLine lineNumber="172"><Highlight kind="normal">    Packed &amp;= <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/bitfields-details/impl/#ad4ab1ed7f6d3975d42cd0a9f7ddcf219">~Mask</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00173" /><CodeLine lineNumber="173"><Highlight kind="normal">    Packed |= StorageValue &lt;&lt; Bitfield::Shift;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00174" /><CodeLine lineNumber="174"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00175" /><CodeLine lineNumber="175"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00179" /><CodeLine lineNumber="179"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> StorageType StorageValue = (Packed &amp; <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/bitfields-details/impl/#ad4ab1ed7f6d3975d42cd0a9f7ddcf219">Mask</a>) &gt;&gt; Bitfield::Shift;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00180" /><CodeLine lineNumber="180"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/bitfields-details/compressor/#ae31ff7880e8cf9d72bd53746d971bf06">C::unpack</a>(StorageValue);</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00187" /><CodeLine lineNumber="187"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00188" /><CodeLine lineNumber="188"><Highlight kind="comment">/// &#96;Bitfield&#96; deals with the following type:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00189" /><CodeLine lineNumber="189"><Highlight kind="comment">/// - unsigned enums</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00190" /><CodeLine lineNumber="190"><Highlight kind="comment">/// - signed and unsigned integer</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00191" /><CodeLine lineNumber="191"><Highlight kind="comment">/// - &#96;bool&#96;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00192" /><CodeLine lineNumber="192"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Internally though we only manipulate integer with well defined and</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00193" /><CodeLine lineNumber="193"><Highlight kind="comment">/// consistent semantics, this excludes typed enums and &#96;bool&#96; that are replaced</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00194" /><CodeLine lineNumber="194"><Highlight kind="comment">/// with their unsigned counterparts. The correct type is restored in the public</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00195" /><CodeLine lineNumber="195"><Highlight kind="comment">/// API.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00196" /><CodeLine lineNumber="196"><Highlight kind="normal">template &lt;typename T, bool = std::is&#95;enum&lt;T&gt;::value&gt;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00197" /><CodeLine lineNumber="197" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/bitfields-details/resolveunderlyingtype"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">struct </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/bitfields-details/resolveunderlyingtype">ResolveUnderlyingType</a> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00198" /><CodeLine lineNumber="198" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/bitfields-details/resolveunderlyingtype/#a4c2aa122f10ecb5f1315d106a43da9aa"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">using </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/bitfields-details/resolveunderlyingtype/#a4c2aa122f10ecb5f1315d106a43da9aa">type</a> = std::underlying&#95;type&#95;t&lt;T&gt;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00199" /><CodeLine lineNumber="199"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00200" /><CodeLine lineNumber="200" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/bitfields-details/resolveunderlyingtype-1894ccc07fdcdbf1d7beb00bbf18f805"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">template</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &lt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">typename</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> T&gt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">struct </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/bitfields-details/resolveunderlyingtype">ResolveUnderlyingType</a>&lt;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/mips/mips16isellowering-cpp/#a0acb682b8260ab1c60b918599864e2e5">T</a>, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/false">false</a>&gt; &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00201" /><CodeLine lineNumber="201" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/bitfields-details/resolveunderlyingtype-1894ccc07fdcdbf1d7beb00bbf18f805/#aefbb02cfc684ce869dfc1d382cf9f780"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">using </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/bitfields-details/resolveunderlyingtype-1894ccc07fdcdbf1d7beb00bbf18f805/#aefbb02cfc684ce869dfc1d382cf9f780">type</a> = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/mips/mips16isellowering-cpp/#a0acb682b8260ab1c60b918599864e2e5">T</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00204" /><CodeLine lineNumber="204"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// In case sizeof(bool) != 1, replace &#96;void&#96; by an additionnal</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00205" /><CodeLine lineNumber="205"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// std::conditional.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00206" /><CodeLine lineNumber="206" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/bitfields-details/resolveunderlyingtype-f0800806bb2b027d53758f20ee230aed/#a9e3d6636015fece369aa0c6a57754fd3"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">using </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/bitfields-details/resolveunderlyingtype-f0800806bb2b027d53758f20ee230aed/#a9e3d6636015fece369aa0c6a57754fd3">type</a> = std::conditional&#95;t&lt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">sizeof</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">(bool) == 1, uint8&#95;t, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">&gt;;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00213" /><CodeLine lineNumber="213"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Describes an element of a Bitfield. This type is then used with the</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00214" /><CodeLine lineNumber="214"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Bitfield static member functions.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00215" /><CodeLine lineNumber="215"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// \\tparam T         The type of the field once in unpacked form.</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00217" /><CodeLine lineNumber="217"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// \\tparam Size      The size of the field.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00218" /><CodeLine lineNumber="218"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// \\tparam MaxValue  For enums the maximum enum allowed.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00219" /><CodeLine lineNumber="219"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">template</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &lt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">typename</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/mips/mips16isellowering-cpp/#a0acb682b8260ab1c60b918599864e2e5">T</a>, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a>, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/inlineorder-cpp/#a7ee6f0cb51c3b9056199e9a0001fe8c3a6f6cb72d544962fa333e2e34ce64f719">Size</a>,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00220" /><CodeLine lineNumber="220"><Highlight kind="normal">            <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/mips/mips16isellowering-cpp/#a0acb682b8260ab1c60b918599864e2e5">T</a> MaxValue = std::is&#95;enum&lt;T&gt;::value</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00221" /><CodeLine lineNumber="221"><Highlight kind="normal">                             ? <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/mips/mips16isellowering-cpp/#a0acb682b8260ab1c60b918599864e2e5">T</a>(0) </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// coupled with static&#95;assert below</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00222" /><CodeLine lineNumber="222"><Highlight kind="normal">                             : std::numeric&#95;limits&lt;T&gt;::max()&gt;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00231" /><CodeLine lineNumber="231" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/bitfield/element/#ac97bc0b40f8f7b458e734291ef255f93"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">constexpr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/bitfield/element/#ac97bc0b40f8f7b458e734291ef255f93">NextBit</a> = <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/bitfield/element/#a232de8cc034a792e04c52ceb543e613a">Shift</a> + <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/bitfield/element/#a37325735aef69cd7556de3b835767d55">Bits</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
